dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2025, Kazakhstan's Ministry of Emergency Situations is activating all warning sirens nationwide at 9 a.m. on May 22nd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty five, Kazakhstan's Ministry of Emergency Situations is activating all warning sirens nationwide at nine a.m. on May twenty second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To test the regional alert system using the 'Attention everyone!' signal, all available warning sirens will be activated nationwide at 09:00 on May 22, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, for that Ört-2025 drill—it's a two-day exercise focused on wildfire response.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, for that Örtminus twenty twenty five drill-it's a two-day exercise focused on wildfire response.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the ministry's press service, the sirens are part of a nationwide emergency drill, Ã–rt-2025 (Fire-2025), taking place from May 22 to 23. The exercise is aimed at assessing the country's preparedness for combating wildfires.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the main coordination center's actually in the Pavlodar region this time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the main coordination center's actually in the Pavlodar region this time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main coordination center for the drill will be located in the Pavlodar region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Interesting—and Russian emergency services are joining too, for border area cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Interesting-and Russian emergency services are joining too, for border area cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Russian emergency services will also participate to practice joint response operations in border areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They're testing the 'Attention everyone!' alert system, so it's uh, pretty comprehensive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They're testing the 'Attention everyone!' alert system, so it's uh, pretty comprehensive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To test the regional alert system using the 'Attention everyone!' signal, all available warning sirens will be activated nationwide at 09:00 on May 22, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're really urging people not to panic, which makes sense—sirens can be startling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're really urging people not to panic, which makes sense-sirens can be startling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We urge citizens to stay calm and not to give in to panic or rumors, the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It reminds me of the drill they did back in April in Almaty, with the earthquake alerts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It reminds me of the drill they did back in April in Almaty, with the earthquake alerts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on April 30, sirens were heard in Almaty during a scheduled citywide earthquake preparedness drill.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, when residents got those smartphone warnings with the tones? That was effective, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, when residents got those smartphone warnings with the tones? That was effective, I think.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At that time, residents also received smartphone alerts accompanied by loud warning tones.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm. Seems like they're really stepping up their preparedness drills lately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm. Seems like they're really stepping up their preparedness drills lately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely a good idea, especially with wildfires becoming more common in the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely a good idea, especially with wildfires becoming more common in the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And having cross-border coordination with Russia is smart—fires don't care about borders, after all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And having cross-border coordination with Russia is smart-fires don't care about borders, after all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. I wonder if other neighboring countries might join future exercises too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. I wonder if other neighboring countries might join future exercises too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Could be! It's all about building that regional response capacity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be! It's all about building that regional response capacity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Let's just hope citizens take it seriously but stay calm, like they're asking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's just hope citizens take it seriously but stay calm, like they're asking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Drills only work if people respond appropriately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Drills only work if people respond appropriately.
